title: Part J
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not explain how the farmer could modify the investigation in a way that would likely alter the results, such as any of the following:

· The farmer could plant different varieties of alfalfa to test natural resistance to the weevil.

· The farmer could use different types of insecticides on additional plots.

· The farmer could use different amounts of the same insecticide on additional plots.

· The farmer could use different natural/biological control organisms on additional plots.
